title: Abomination

fields.name: Abilities (Untransformed):
fields.value: - At night, choose to Transform. You and all of your visitors tonight gain 3 Stress from witnessing this.

fields.name: Abilities (Transformed):
fields.value:
- At night, choose a player to Maul. Rampage at their house. You may also target yourself.
- At night, choose to Un-Transform. You and all your visitors will heal 2 Stress from witnessing this.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Gain Powerful Attack and Basic Defense while Transformed.
- At the end of each night while Transformed, you gain 1 Stress.
- Players who visit you while Transformed gain 2 Stress. This does not apply on the night you Transform or Un-Transform.
- If Roleblocked or Controlled while Transformed, you stay home and rampage.
